snippet: Jamshed Bharucha announced his resignation amid infighting and an inquiry by the state attorney general into the management of the college’s finances.
abstract: Cooper Union president Jamshed Bharucha announces his resignation; departure comes during infighting and inquiry by New York State attorney general into management of college's finances.
lead_paragraph: Jamshed Bharucha announced his resignation amid infighting and an inquiry by the state attorney general into the management of the college’s finances.

keywords.value: Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art
